text: The 2008 Boston Pizza Cup, the men's curling championships for Alberta, took place on February 12-17 at the Grant Fuhr Arena in Spruce Grove, Alberta. The Kevin Martin rink won the final over Randy Ferbey's team and represented Alberta at the 2008 Tim Hortons Brier. ==Results== Triple-knockout format {| class="wikitable" |- ! Skip ! Wins ! title: 2008 Boston Pizza Cup
